title: Estimation of Characteristics-based Quantile Factor Models. (arXiv:2304.13206v1 [econ.EM])
abstract: This paper studies the estimation of characteristic-based quantile factor models where the factor loadings are unknown functions of observed individual characteristics while the idiosyncratic error terms are subject to conditional quantile restrictions. We propose a three-stage estimation procedure that is easily implementable in practice and has nice properties. The convergence rates, the limiting distributions of the estimated factors and loading functions, and a consistent selection criterion for the number of factors at each quantile are derived under general conditions. The proposed estimation methodology is shown to work satisfactorily when: (i) the idiosyncratic errors have heavy tails, (ii) the time dimension of the panel dataset is not large, and (iii) the number of factors exceeds the number of characteristics. Finite sample simulations and an empirical application aimed at estimating the loading functions of the daily returns of a large panel of S\&P500 index securities help

translated_title: 基于特征的分位因子模型的估计
translated_abstract: 本文研究了基于特征的分位因子模型的估计，其中因子载荷是观察到的个体特征的未知函数，而个体误差项受到条件分位限制。我们提出了一个三阶段的估计过程，在实践中易于实现并具有良好的性质。在一般条件下，推导了估计因子和载荷函数的渐近收敛率、极限分布以及每个分位点上因子个数的一致选择标准。所提出的估计方法在以下情况下被证明能够令人满意地工作：(i)个体误差的尾部很重，(ii)面板数据集的时间维度不大，(iii)因子数量超过特征数量。有限样本模拟和一个旨在估计大量S&P500指数证券的日回报的载荷函数的实证应用有助于。
tldr: 本文研究了基于特征的分位因子模型的估计，提出了一个易于实现并具有良好性质的三阶段估计过程。在一般条件下，推导了估计因子和载荷函数的渐近收敛率、极限分布以及每个分位点上因子个数的一致选择标准。有限样本模拟和实证应用结果表明该方法具有良好的估计性能。
